## linearToGamma() function

Converts a vec3 color from linear space to gamma space

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function linearToGamma(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, color: PBShaderExp): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  color | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The vec3 color to be converted |

**Returns:**

any

The gamma space vec3 color
